name: city-alerts-backend
description: Sistema de alertas urbanas basado en microservicios

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=services/ingress-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/users-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/alerts-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/notifier-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/logs-service"
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate --workspace=services/users-service && npm run migrate --workspace=services/alerts-service
scripts.seed: npm run seed --workspace=services/users-service && npm run seed --workspace=services/alerts-service

author: Felakz <felakz@github.com>
